body: Plot recap, since it's not explained super clearly; Aya is possessed by a being or spirit, which makes her do perverted things. At first, she has no memories of these perverted things, and has no idea anything strange is going on. Later, the possession changes her common sense, so Aya thinks doing perverted things is normal. At the very end, it's revealed that Aya herself is also doing perverted things while not under possession due to all that she went through. Reimu exorcised the being possessing Aya, and everyone thinks she's back to normal, but she's still a pervert. She takes a drug that turns her into a futa, and goes on to fuck everyone in town. Happy End.
Aya is anything BUT an underrated touhou, she is one of the most popular.
Bruh why is the only comment a a spam
